# controlDependencies

**Instance Property**

The list of nodes that need to execute before executing the node.

## Declaration

```swift
var controlDependencies: [MTLFunctionStitchingFunctionNode] { get set }
```

## Discussion

When a stitched function calls functions that have side effects on their input data, you often need the GPU to execute functions in a specific order. In such cases, use the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLFunctionStitchingFunctionNode/controlDependencies] property to specify which nodes need to run before executing this node.

## Configuring a function node

- **name**: The name of the function to call.
- **arguments**: An ordered list of the nodes that provide the function’s arguments.
